mapper.select: SELECT m.permission FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE m.`status` = 0 AND r.`status` = 0 AND m.deleted = 0 AND r.deleted = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userid}

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.link, m.component, m.is_frame, m.visible, m.STATUS, ifnull(m.permission, '') AS permission, m.keep_alive, m.type, m.icon, m.sort, m.create_time FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.type IN (0, 1) AND m.STATUS = 0 AND m.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.sort

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.NAME, m.link, m.component, m.is_frame, m.visible, m.STATUS, ifnull(m.permission, '') AS permission, m.keep_alive, m.type, m.icon, m.sort, m.create_time FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} and m.type in (0, 1) and m.status = 0 AND r.status = 0 AND m.deleted = 0 AND r.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.sort
SELECT IFNULL((SELECT MAX(sort) FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY sort desc), 0) AS result;
